43.ara-name: كتاب الأدب عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Mas'ud:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "A man is not lead in his dominion, and his seat of honor in his house is not sat in without his permission

chapter.eng-name: Chapter ['A Man Is Not To Be Lead In His Dominion']
